explains: adj. 起纹理的；质地不平的；（艺术、文学、音乐等）有神韵的
v. 使具浮凸结构（或特征）（texture 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: textured yarn 变形纱；光亮纱线；膨松纱；结构纱；花色纱
textured surface 网纹表面；变形表面；布纹面

sentences.en: There are also textured things to touch, from the scaly green Alligator to the furry tail of the sleeping Zorilla.
sentences.cn: 从带鳞的绿色短尾鳄到熟睡臭鼬的毛尾巴，都可以摸到纹理的质感。

sentences.en: The shoe's sole had a slightly textured surface.
sentences.cn: 鞋底表面有较浅的纹理。

sentences.en: The green ice portion was textured by seawater erosion.
sentences.cn: 绿色的冰部分被海水侵蚀，并形成纹理。
